title: Font lookup ?
content:
Good afternoon,

I am wondering what font the Google Project Glass logo is based on ?

[https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-O0L4XRvq7fk/UTeB\_p6HGDI/AAAAAAAAIzs/7...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019153505/https:/lh4.googleusercontent.com/-O0L4XRvq7fk/UTeB_p6HGDI/AAAAAAAAIzs/7PMixA4LeK4/s500/glass_profile.jpg "https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-O0L4XRvq7fk/UTeB\_p6HGDI/AAAAAAAAIzs/7PMixA4LeK4/s500/glass\_profile.jpg")

I read in some posts of this forum that it used to be Roboto, but obviously they changed their logo since the answer was proposed ...

Thanks a lot
author: rafiduck

comments.content:
I hope that's not the final version - the outlines are super cruddy.

hhp
